Dear Blogger,

I, Lorijn van der Valk of Van Doorne N.V., The Netherlands, do solemnly and sincerely declare as follows: 

I am an agent authorized to act on behalf of the owner of all rights in and to the works of Dick Bruna 

Dick Bruna is the maker of the Miffy (in Dutch
